remarks: A complex pre-Hilbert space satisfies the parallelogram law. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
statement:
nmpar.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
nmpar.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
nmpar.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` W ) $.
nmpar.n $e |- N = ( norm ` W ) $.
nmpar $p |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( ( ( N ` ( A .+ B ) ) ^ 2 ) + ( ( N ` ( A .- B ) ) ^ 2 ) ) = ( 2 x. ( ( ( N ` A ) ^ 2 ) + ( ( N ` B ) ^ 2 ) ) ) ) $.
